overview:
“Mitch Lewis, SVP/GM Service Providers Business Unit & Corporate Marketing, brings more than 25 years of global sales, marketing, and general management experience in wireless and wireline telecom suppliers and operators. Prior to his SVP/GM role, Mr. Lewis held the position of VP Marketing & Product Management at Dilithium.

Prior to joining Dilithium, Mr. Lewis was President and Country Manager of Ericsson Indonesia, responsible for all in-country operations of a 500 employee multi-hundred million dollar business. During his nearly 15 year career at Ericsson, Mr. Lewis held senior sales and marketing positions including Vice President, Sales and Marketing - Asia Pacific at Ericsson Market Unit Wireline, based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, where he was responsible for multi-service datacom and broadband networks business within Asia Pacific. From 1999 to 2002, Mr. Lewis was General Manager and Director of Global Marketing for Ericsson Business Unit Systems, based in Stockholm, Sweden, eventually responsible for the marketing of mobile, fixed, and datacom functions globally.

Prior to this role, Mr. Lewis was General Manager, Business and Solutions Planning - New and Global Operators, based in Stockholm, Sweden, responsible for global strategic planning and business development for new and global operators.

Prior to Ericsson, Mr. Lewis held increasing management and operations positions at Pacific Bell (later SBC/AT&T) in Los Angeles, California. Mr. Lewis received BS and MBA degrees from Pepperdine University and has completed executive management programs at Stanford University and the Harvard Business School.”

(Source: Dilithium Networks)

relationships.title: SVP/GM, Service Providers Business Unit & Corporate Marketing
